summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2696, for the improvement of Rainier Avenue, from Bayview Street to Hanford Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 31666 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
